channel.title: Client says "Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading Runescape"
channel.description: Ok so everytime I open up the client it says "Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading Runescape" I have tried everything that I can and nothing will work. I have I have Teamviewer and Skype.

item.title: Client says "Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading Runescape"
item.dc:creator: @corbinzscape corbinzscape
item.description:
@corbinzscape wrote:

I have changed the background image but it has been working for like 10+ times after i changed it.
